item.description:
This month Doug Peary will present an unusual version of his Humanist Heroes series, this time foregoing his usual sources of modern biographies and portraying Abraham Lincoln using the words of Lincoln's contemporary, Robert Green Ingersoll.

Doug is standing in for Herb Silverman, who was previously announced as our guest speaker for our April meeting. Unfortunately, Herb cannot be with us this month.

We'll start with coffee and conversation at 7:30 PM. The main program will follow a brief business meeting at 8:00 PM.

At the business meeting we'll discuss disbursing money from the association to pay for a "campership" at Camp Quest, the secular residential summer camp that we'll be hearing more about at our 19th anniversary meeting in May.

(It is not necessary to RSVP for this event; I'm listing it as a meetup so that you can get e-mail reminders from meetup.com)
item.name: Humanist Association of Connecticut Monthly Meeting
